snippet: A former mayor was charged with 21 counts of offenses that included conspiracy, bribery and filing false tax returns. The charges were widely expected.
lead_paragraph: A former mayor was charged with 21 counts of offenses that included conspiracy, bribery and filing false tax returns. The charges were widely expected.

headline.seo: Corruption Charges for Ray Nagin of New Orleans
headline.main: Ray Nagin, Former New Orleans Mayor, Faces Corruption Charges
